attributes.action: Cap Electricity and Gas Prices and build our own Power Stations
attributes.additional_details:
We pay for our European neighbours cheap Electricity and Gas because their Governments have a Cap on fuel rises where our does not.

Our Electrcity and Gas Suppliers are foreign owned as Government has failed to plan for our Energy needs.

This makes us vulnerable.

Cap Electricity and Gas Prices and build our own Power Stations.
